title: The Villainess Who Has Been Killed 108 Times - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Assassins   Dark   Death of Loved Ones   Female Protagonist   Maids   Multiple POV   Murders   Nobles   Royalty   Sadistic Characters   Second Chance   Time Loop   Tragic Past   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Namakura   なまくら
description: Stabbed 7 times. Massacred 11 times. Beheaded 5 times. Hanged 3 times. Burnt to death 7 times. Drowned 8 times. Run over 3 times. Shot 12 times. Poisoned 6 times. Strangled 7 times, etcetera… Scarlett was a villainess whose life has repeated 108 times in total. The duke’s redheaded, red-eyed daughter summoned fear and terrorized the nation as a ruthless queen. In all of her 108 lifetimes, she always ended up dying at the age of 28. After 107 lifetimes ending by being killed by one of the five heroes and the flower-minded heroine, she died for the 108th due to an accident. Thus on her 109th life, Scarlett regains all her memories and tries to break free from the loop. Will Scarlett be able to break the chains of the Red Curse?>
